title: Stock Futures Waver; Tesla Shares Stabilize After Sliding
sub_head: Investors will scrutinize Wednesday’s inflation data for clues on future interest-rate policy
body:
U.S. stock futures paused as investors awaited data on consumer prices, amid building concerns over inflationary pressures in the global economy.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 edged down 0.1% Wednesday a day after the broad index ended an eight-day streak of record closes—its longest streak of records since 1997. Blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average Futures weakened 0.2%.
